project.description: Samlejobb som kjører alle skriptjobber vi har for å sjekke koden og dokumentere leveransen.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
find -name ibm-deploy.scaj2ee -print -exec false {} + find . -name "*WSIMP.import" -exec FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/bindingCheckHudson.py {} + FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/cons_xml_check.py FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2 FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/System.out.print_Search.py FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-Import_context_check.py FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-validFromCheck.py
# Sjekker om confluence er oppe: if ! wget --spider http://confluence.adeo.no 2>/dev/zero; then echo -e '\nConfluence er nede, avslutter!\n' ; exit 0 ;fi
################################################# # Skript som genererer automatisk dokumentasjon # #################################################
# - EJB Avhengigheter: FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-EJBImports.py --path FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/ --page 164151929 # - Koblinger mot produsenter: FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-doc-produsent-avhengighet.py FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/ 164152086 # - Tilgangsstyring: FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-findRolesOnModules.py --path FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/ --page 164152095
svn up /home/ci/svn-repos/2016HL2/tjenester/ --username svnguest --password Subversion01 --no-auth-cache # - Moduloversikt: FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-ImportComponentExportPublish.py --path FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/ --page 164152091 --design "/home/ci/svn-repos/2016HL2/tjenester/spesifikasjon/implementasjon/" # - Tilgangsstyring per samhandler: FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/esb-tools/esb-scripts/bin/HUDSON-findRolesForSamhandlereOnModules.py --path FEATURE_BRANCH_8_7_0_D20160119_2016HL2/ --design "/home/ci/svn-repos/2016HL2/tjenester" --envT 164152115 --envQ 164152111 --envP 164152108
